Release Notes

Release Notes

Welcome to the Embedthis Pak™ installation release notes. This document provides release-specific information for Pak.

License

This software is copyrighted and distributed under license. It is available under a GPLv2 open source license. Please read LICENSE.md for details.

System Requirements

Binary releases are supplied for the following operating systems.

  • Windows 7 or later
  • Mac OS X 10.9 or later

The following additional operating systems are supported by compiling Pak from source.

  • Linux 2.6 and later

Build and Tool Requirements

If you are building the software from source you may require:

  • MakeMe version 0.8.6 or later to build with MakeMe.

Development Environment Support

If you wish to build Pak from source code, you will need to use a "C" compiler and associated development tools. Several development environments are supported. You may choose any of the following to compile and build samples and source code.

  • Linux GNU tools
  • Windows Visual Studio 2013 and later
  • Mac Xcode 6.4 and later
